top_comments.comment: Your  Easter egg hunting skills are lacking. This is more of a Easter repost. Lazy at best

DLSS

Makes everything look like Blurry crap
You always cover stuff everyone else has covered.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Found out about #6 looking for a way to bypass level 6-7. My seven year old self somehow made it past a gauntlet of chomps, bomb platforms, and bandits, and yet failed to enter a pipe that was clearly the way out at the end. Kids are stupid, except when they’re not.
